contentrichtext.text: {{Multiple issues| {{BLP sources|date=May 2011}} {{notability|date=May 2011}} }} '''Rogan LaBier''' is an [[United States|American]] [[financial services]] executive and author.<ref>{{cite news|url=http://redtape.msnbc.msn.com/_news/2006/07/07/6346078-nasd-laptops-stolen-but-risks-played-down|title=NASD laptops stolen, but risks played down|date=7 July 2006|work=[[MSN]]|accessdate=2 May 2011}}</ref> A private technology and operations consultant to securities firms, LaBier has held principal positions at [[Terra Nova Trading]], [[Tradeportal Securities]], [[MB Trading]] and [[Sonic Trading]]. He has also been a proprietary trader and [[Nasdaq]] Market Maker. LaBier is the author and contributing author of three books: "The Nasdaq Traders' Toolkit," "What Works in Online Trading" and "Tools of the Trade." He is also featured as chapter 10 of Dr. Jan Baird's book "Electronic Trading Masters."<ref name="Baird2001">{{cite book|last=Baird|first=Allen Jan|title=Electronic trading masters: secrets from the pros|url=http://books.google.com/books?id=3D9lmEiyyswC&pg=PR14|accessdate=2 May 2011|date=2001-01-08|publisher=John Wiley and Sons|isbn=978-0-471-40193-3|pages=203â}}</ref> LaBier is currently CEO of acquisitions intermediary [[Broker Dealer Exchange, LLC]] in [[St. Petersburg, Florida]]. ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Labier, Rogan | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Labier, Rogan}} [[Category:American chief executives|LaBier]] [[Category:Living people]] {{US-CEO-stub}}
